document.full_text: yemen's president ali abdullah saleh said on saturday he was prepared to step down if allowed a dignified departure, but the opposition accused him of maneuvering to hold on to power.
document.title: yemen close to transition of power deal: minister
lines_and_colors: yemen's president ali abdullah saleh said on saturday he was prepared to step down if allowed a dignified departure, but the opposition accused him of maneuvering to hold on to power.
